      • build

        public PosixViewAttributeAction build()
        从接口复制的说明: Builder
        Builds the object after all configuration has been set. This will use default values for any unspecified attributes for the object.
        指定者:
        build 在接口中 Builder<PosixViewAttributeAction>
        返回:
        the configured instance.

      • withFilePermissionsString

        public PosixViewAttributeAction.Builder withFilePermissionsString(String filePermissionsString)
        Define file permissions in posix format to apply during action execution eligible files. Example:

        rw-rw-rw

        r--r--r--

        参数:
        filePermissionsString - Permissions to apply
        返回:
